name: Decaptcha
tagline: Decode certain type of captchas using python
body:
CAPTCHas scripts (Scripts to decode captchas)
=============================================

Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Are Same :p

Dependencies:: 

    libleptonica, libtesseract3, libwebp2, tesseract-ocr,
    tesseract-ocr-eng, tesseract-ocr-equ, tesseract-ocr-osd
    
For debian user::

    $ sudo apt-get install tesseract-ocr

This will install all the dependencies.

The solved captcha data will be saved into same as pwd in data.txt. (y)

* CAPTCHas0.py - dlldll.com captcha solver

Images taken form dlldll.com for testing::

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamsudip/decaptcha/master/CAPTCHas0/test0.jpg)

Accuracy: 0/2

Run it as ::

    $ python CAPTCHas0.py test0.jpeg
    
The solved captcha data will be saved into same as pwd in data.txt. (y)

* CAPTCHas1.py - Flipkart.com captcha solver

Example images taken from Flipkart website for testing:

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamsudip/decaptcha/master/CAPTCHas1/test10.jpeg)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamsudip/decaptcha/master/CAPTCHas1/test9.jpeg)

Accuracy: 9/10

Run it as ::

    $ python CAPTCHas1.py test1.jpeg

The solved captcha data will be saved into same as pwd in data.txt. (y)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
